SEARCH
Package com.project.sportsnewsbackend.service.Stories

Class StoriesService

java.lang.Object
com.project.sportsnewsbackend.service.Stories.StoriesService
@Service public class StoriesService extends Object
Service class for managing stories within the sports news platform. Provides methods for CRUD operations on stories, utilizing the StoriesRepository. This class acts as a bridge between the controller layer and the repository, ensuring that business logic and data access are properly separated.

  • Method Details

    • addStory

      public Stories addStory(Stories story)
      Adds a new story to the database.
      Parameters:
      story - The Stories entity to add.
      Returns:
      The saved Stories entity.

    • getAllStories

      public List<Stories> getAllStories()
      Retrieves all stories from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of Stories entities.

    • getStoryById

      public Optional<Stories> getStoryById(Long id)
      Fetches a single story by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the story to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the found story or empty if not found.

    • updateStory

      public Stories updateStory(Long id, Stories storyDetails)
      Updates an existing story with new details. If the story with the specified ID does not exist, a RuntimeException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the story to update.
      storyDetails - The new details for the story.
      Returns:
      The updated Stories entity.

    • deleteStory

      public void deleteStory(Long id)
      Deletes a story by its ID. If the story is not found, a RuntimeException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the story to delete.
